properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 14 at 2:26AM CST until February 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
...GALE FORCE WINDS EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO SATURDAY...

* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
waves 8 to 13 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY
